price: (Namichis) ni jedhe: “Sila ani ati ana wajjiin obsuudhaaf hin dandeessu hin jennee?”
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
